name: Land of the Toast
description:
We take the simple things in our life for granted. This explores some of the magic hidden away in our everyday lives. Like toast.

My submission for the Nordic Game Jam 2020: Everyday Magic.

Controls:

  • WASD: Movement
  • Mouse: Grappling Hook (only on hooks)
  • E: Interact with objects

Thanks for playing my game and hope you enjoy it!
